sect1.title: UNIX like install
sect1.para: Cartoweb 3 installer is "cw3setup.php", located in the root directory of the application: Simply run php -f cw3setup.php to setup the application.

para.screen: (no command, by default): install cartoweb3 cvs : install cartoweb3 from cvs check : check configuration get[=user] : CVS checkout with user name [anonymous] get_libs : get required libraries dirs : create user directories perms[=www-data] : set writing perms for web-user [www-data] - set ownership if run as superuser, - give write permission instead. create_conf : create the new configuration link_or_copy : link or copy paths for web browser setup[=path] : setup a new project in existing installation remove : remove cartoweb3

sect1.title: Windows install
sect1.para: The process is as simple as for UNIX, but the windows installer is not available yet.
